downloadTitle: Security for Tables in a Table Inheritance Hierarchy White paper
downloadDescription: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 enables developers to model generalizations and specializations by using table inheritance. This document explains how tables that are defined in an inheritance hierarchy work with the role-based security subsystem.
